name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Richard David FELDMAN.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Richard David FELDMAN.

opinions.text: Richard David Feldman, of Whitestone, New York, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.

casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Richard David FELDMAN.
No. D-2832.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 29, 2015.
Opinion
